product_name: Outside Inside Winter Sports Ornament Set - Set of 4 - 2012/2013 Closeout
long_description: Incredible detail gives the 4 ornaments of the Outside Inside Winter Sports Ornament Set a rustic, realistic appearance that will look great on your Christmas tree for years to come. Made of polystone resin with a braided cord for hanging from the tree. Includes a toboggan, mug of hot chocolate, ice skate and snowshoe. Closeout.
short_description: Incredible detail gives the 4 ornaments of the Outside Inside Winter Sports Ornament Set a rustic, realistic appearance that will look great on your Christmas tree for years to come.
